name: Oliver
description:
Oliver is a single player 2.5D platformer with a stylized low poly design. You play Oliver, the protagonist, who can't remember his past. Explore the environment on the planet Oliver crash landed on. Fight enemies, discover items, solve riddles and most importantly, find a way back. An almost ready space ship is waiting for you to leave the planet and finally figure out your identity.

During his adventure Oliver will master abilities such as punch, stomp, dash, walljump and swim.

The game contains linear and non linear map structure; beautiful designed environment and great ambience in look and sound.
